policies.title: Our Policies
policies.subtitle: Privacy & Data Handling
policies.p1: Your privacy is paramount. This application is designed to function without a backend server for storing user data. All your information, including your portfolio and transaction history, is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage.
policies.p2: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. Your virtual wallet and trading activities are completely private to your session and your device.
policies.p3: If you provide an API key for AI features, it is also stored only in your local environment and is never sent to or stored on any server associated with this application. It is used directly by your browser to communicate with the AI service provider.
